headline: Is It Time To Reassess McKesson (MCK) After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether McKesson's recent share price puts it at a fair level or not, you are in the right place. McKesson's stock last closed at US$851.12, with returns of 2.0% over the past week, 3.4% over the past month, 3.4% year to date, 41.7% over the past year and 137.5% over three years, while the five year return sits at 374.0%. Recent attention on McKesson has been shaped by ongoing updates around the business and the broader healthcare sector, which help explain...
